column4: I'm try to set up a WEP 64/128 bit Hex on our home wireless router, does anyone know how to go about doing it within Ubuntu?
I'm trying to setup a WEP 64/128 bit Hex security on our home wireless router, does anyone know how to go about doing this in Ubuntu?
why bother if you are using wep?
if you're going to encrypt your network use WPA, using no encryption and a mac filter is better than wep
